# firehydrant_task_list_entity (Resource)

TaskListEntity Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "firehydrant_task_list_entity" "my_tasklistentity" {
  description = "...my_description..."
  name        = "...my_name..."
}
```

### Nested Schema for `task_list_items`
